name: Yusuf Ali
text: Sad: By the Qur'an, Full of Admonition: (This is the Truth).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But the Unbelievers (are steeped) in self-glory and Separatism.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: How many generations before them did We destroy? In the end they cried (for mercy)- when there was no longer time for being saved!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So they wonder that a Warner has come to them from among themselves! and the Unbelievers say, "This is a sorcerer telling lies!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Has he made the gods (all) into one Allah? Truly this is a wonderful thing!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And the leader among them go away (impatiently), (saying), "Walk ye away, and remain constant to your gods! For this is truly a thing designed (against you)!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "We never heard (the like) of this among the people of these latter days: this is nothing but a made-up tale!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "What! has the Message been sent to him - (Of all persons) among us?"... but they are in doubt concerning My (Own) Message! Nay, they have not yet tasted My Punishment!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Or have they the treasures of the mercy of thy Lord,- the Exalted in Power, the Grantor of Bounties without measure?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Or have they the dominion of the heavens and the earth and all between? If so, let them mount up with the ropes and means (to reach that end)!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But there - will be put to flight even a host of confederates.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Before them (were many who) rejected messengers,- the people of Noah, and 'Ad, and Pharaoh, the Lord of Stakes,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And Thamud, and the people of Lut, and the Companions of the Wood; - such were the Confederates.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Not one (of them) but rejected the messengers, but My punishment came justly and inevitably (on them).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: These (today) only wait for a single mighty Blast, which (when it comes) will brook no delay.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They say: "Our Lord! hasten to us our sentence (even) before the Day of Account!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Have patience at what they say, and remember our servant David, the man of strength: for he ever turned (to Allah).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: It was We that made the hills declare, in unison with him, Our Praises, at eventide and at break of day,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And the birds gathered (in assemblies): all with him did turn (to Allah).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We strengthened his kingdom, and gave him wisdom and sound judgment in speech and decision.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Has the Story of the Disputants reached thee? Behold, they climbed over the wall of the private chamber;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: When they entered the presence of David, and he was terrified of them, they said: "Fear not: we are two disputants, one of whom has wronged the other: Decide now between us with truth, and treat us not with injustice, but guide us to the even Path..

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "This man is my brother: He has nine and ninety ewes, and I have (but) one: Yet he says, 'commit her to my care,' and is (moreover) harsh to me in speech."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (David) said: "He has undoubtedly wronged thee in demanding thy (single) ewe to be added to his (flock of) ewes: truly many are the partners (in business) who wrong each other: Not so do those who believe and work deeds of righteousness, and how few are they?"... and David gathered that We had tried him: he asked forgiveness of his Lord, fell down, bowing (in prostration), and turned (to Allah in repentance).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So We forgave him this (lapse): he enjoyed, indeed, a Near Approach to Us, and a beautiful place of (Final) Return.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: O David! We did indeed make thee a vicegerent on earth: so judge thou between men in truth (and justice): Nor follow thou the lusts (of thy heart), for they will mislead thee from the Path of Allah: for those who wander astray from the Path of Allah, is a Penalty Grievous, for that they forget the Day of Account.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Not without purpose did We create heaven and earth and all between! that were the thought of Unbelievers! but woe to the Unbelievers because of the Fire (of Hell)!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Shall We treat those who believe and work deeds of righteousness, the same as those who do mischief on earth? Shall We treat those who guard against evil, the same as those who turn aside from the right?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Here is) a Book which We have sent down unto thee, full of blessings, that they may mediate on its Signs, and that men of understanding may receive admonition.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: To David We gave Solomon (for a son),- How excellent in Our service! Ever did he turn (to Us)!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Behold, there were brought before him, at eventide coursers of the highest breeding, and swift of foot;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And he said, "Truly do I love the love of good, with a view to the glory of my Lord,"- until (the sun) was hidden in the veil (of night):

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Bring them back to me." then began he to pass his hand over (their) legs and their necks.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And We did try Solomon: We placed on his throne a body (without life); but he did turn (to Us in true devotion):

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said, "O my Lord! Forgive me, and grant me a kingdom which, (it may be), suits not another after me: for Thou art the Grantor of Bounties (without measure).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then We subjected the wind to his power, to flow gently to his order, Whithersoever he willed,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: As also the evil ones, (including) every kind of builder and diver,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: As also others bound together in fetters.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Such are Our Bounties: whether thou bestow them (on others) or withhold them, no account will be asked."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And he enjoyed, indeed, a Near Approach to Us, and a beautiful Place of (Final) Return.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Commemorate Our Servant Job. Behold he cried to his Lord: "The Evil One has afflicted me with distress and suffering!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (The command was given:) "Strike with thy foot: here is (water) wherein to wash, cool and refreshing, and (water) to drink."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And We gave him (back) his people, and doubled their number,- as a Grace from Ourselves, and a thing for commemoration, for all who have Understanding.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And take in thy hand a little grass, and strike therewith: and break not (thy oath)." Truly We found him full of patience and constancy. How excellent in Our service! ever did he turn (to Us)!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And commemorate Our Servants Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, possessors of Power and Vision.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Verily We did choose them for a special (purpose)- proclaiming the Message of the Hereafter.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They were, in Our sight, truly, of the company of the Elect and the Good.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And commemorate Isma'il, Elisha, and Zul-Kifl: Each of them was of the Company of the Good.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: This is a Message (of admonition): and verily, for the righteous, is a beautiful Place of (Final) Return,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Gardens of Eternity, whose doors will (ever) be open to them;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Therein will they recline (at ease): Therein can they call (at pleasure) for fruit in abundance, and (delicious) drink;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And beside them will be chaste women restraining their glances, (companions) of equal age.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Such is the Promise made, to you for the Day of Account!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Truly such will be Our Bounty (to you); it will never fail;-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Yea, such! but - for the wrong-doers will be an evil place of (Final) Return!-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Hell!- they will burn therein, - an evil bed (indeed, to lie on)!-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Yea, such! - then shall they taste it,- a boiling fluid, and a fluid dark, murky, intensely cold!-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And other Penalties of a similar kind, to match them!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Here is a troop rushing headlong with you! No welcome for them! truly, they shall burn in the Fire!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (The followers shall cry to the misleaders:) "Nay, ye (too)! No welcome for you! It is ye who have brought this upon us! Now evil is (this) place to stay in!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They will say: "Our Lord! whoever brought this upon us,- Add to him a double Penalty in the Fire!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And they will say: "What has happened to us that we see not men whom we used to number among the bad ones?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Did we treat them (as such) in ridicule, or have (our) eyes failed to perceive them?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Truly that is just and fitting,- the mutual recriminations of the People of the Fire!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Say: "Truly am I a Warner: no god is there but the one Allah, Supreme and Irresistible,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "The Lord of the heavens and the earth, and all between,- Exalted in Might, able to enforce His Will, forgiving again and again."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Say: "That is a Message Supreme (above all),-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "From which ye do turn away!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "No knowledge have I of the Chiefs on high, when they discuss (matters) among themselves.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: 'Only this has been revealed to me: that I am to give warning plainly and publicly."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Behold, thy Lord said to the angels: "I am about to create man from clay:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "When I have fashioned him (in due proportion) and breathed into him of My spirit, fall ye down in obeisance unto him."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So the angels prostrated themselves, all of them together:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Not so Iblis: he was haughty, and became one of those who reject Faith.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Allah) said: "O Iblis! What prevents thee from prostrating thyself to one whom I have created with my hands? Art thou haughty? Or art thou one of the high (and mighty) ones?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Iblis) said: "I am better than he: thou createdst me from fire, and him thou createdst from clay."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Allah) said: "Then get thee out from here: for thou art rejected, accursed.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And My curse shall be on thee till the Day of Judgment."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Iblis) said: "O my Lord! Give me then respite till the Day the (dead) are raised."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Allah) said: "Respite then is granted thee-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Till the Day of the Time Appointed."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Iblis) said: "Then, by Thy power, I will put them all in the wrong,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Except Thy Servants amongst them, sincere and purified (by Thy Grace)."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Allah) said: "Then it is just and fitting- and I say what is just and fitting-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "That I will certainly fill Hell with thee and those that follow thee,- every one."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Say: "No reward do I ask of you for this (Qur'an), nor am I a pretender.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "This is no less than a Message to (all) the Worlds.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And ye shall certainly know the truth of it (all) after a while."
